channel.title: [508] Zaros Rage v 0.35 beta [SUMMOINING 99%] Summoning HELP vs NPCS
channel.description:
[size=30pt]ZAROS RAGE[/size] [size=20pt]beta 0.35[/size]
OK guys so i started new project called "[b]Zaros Rage[/b]", my idea is make a BEST player vs Npc system ever so i started with Summoning help.
[b]Info:[/b] -based on Mith scape v.1 -NPC combat have effect on hits to player (like if you have full torag that mean more 0s :D)
I will add more info but for now.. :(
[b]Summoning scroll[/b]: beta 0.3 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/9861/summoning.gif[/img]
[b]Summoning Attacks[/b]: beta 0.35 (no emote) [img]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/8685/summoning2c.gif[/img] [size=18pt] [b]IF you are interested to help PM me thx...[/b][/size]
